types.html:
japonaiserie f (plural japonaiseries)

  1. (art) Japonism, a style in art, or an artistic object, that reflects the influence of Japanese art
    Synonym: japonisme
trans: Japonism, a style in art, or an artistic object, that reflects the influence of Japanese art
